title: Elemi
description: Elemi is the essential oil distilled from the soft resin of the Canarium luzonicum tree. It has a long history of traditional uses.
cleaned_text: problems Elemi is the essential oil distilled from the soft resin of the Canarium luzonicum tree. It has a long history of traditional uses. Elemi has been understood as an endocrine stimulant and as an agent to treat skin maladies. In classic Chinese medicine it is considered to clear fire toxins and recent French research attributes antidepressant qualities to the oil as elemicin has been recognized as a Mono & a Botanical name: Canarium luzonicum You may also enjoy These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA.
